metadata.title: Controlled growth of Sb2Te3 nanoplates and their applications in ultrafast near-infrared photodetection

authors_verbatim: Zhang S.; H Luo; H Wang; J Liu; A Suvorova; Y Ren; C Yuan; W Lei

acknowledgement.exact_text:
Acknowledgement:
The present research work was supported by the Australian Research Council (LE200100032 and DP200103188) as well as a Research Impact Grant of The University of Western Australia (UWA). 
We acknowledge Microscopy Australia Facility at the Center for Microscopy, Characterization and Analysis (CMCA) at UWA and the WA node of the Australian National Fabrication Facility (ANFF) for their facilities.
